title: Frostfire Annie on sale but price not discounted
body:
Hi Riot,

It says in the Featured section of the ingame shop that Frostfire Annie is on sale for 50% off until this Friday, but the price is still 975RP.
It is not in the "On Sale" list of the Skin section.
Is this a bug?

Please advise.

replies.body:
Just noticed it is now discounted.
Thanks for the update, Riot
